page.title: 13Four Oaks -Tourism
page.content: Sutton Park is the main attraction for visitors to this area.It's many lakes attract fishermen,boating enthusiasts,naturalists,and during the wintertime,skaters.For many years it has been the traditional "day_trip" venue for thousands of people from the near by city of Birmingham.The Roman Road,clearly visible in the park, attracts many tourists,while the Sutton and Little Aston golf courses cater for Golfers.Annual events like the International car rallying, Cyclo_Cross,Road Running and many other events add to the masses of people who descend on this normally quiet and sedate suburban area at various times of the year.This area is generally one of highly desirable residences and it is not unusual to find many motorists touring the more exclusive regions' Sight- seeing'.
